external_games.name: Pinball HD: Classic Arcade, Zen + Space Games
Pinball HD: Classic Arcade, Zen + Space Games

name: Pinball HD: Classic Arcade, Zen + Space Games
summary: This unique table features pinball bumpers and targets, plus a color monitor where you can take on a variety of old-school digital minigame challenges - an endless space scroller, plus car racing, missile defense, a block breaker, and more at incrementing skill levels.
